name: Vanishing Bridges
description:
Welcome to Vanishing Bridges, a game made in 3 hours for the Trijam game jam.

You will see the route to the door appear, and then it will become invisible. You can only make a platform visible again by walking on it, but if it's invisible it's still there. (Press H to see the route again briefly, you can do this 3 times per level.)

ADWS or Arrow keys to move. Mouse to look.

Press R to restart level at any time, press X to quit
